events.name: Fireside Chat with Alexis Ohanian, Founder of Reddit
events.description:
Sign up for free here: bit.ly/Alexis-SG

Alexis Ohanian is in town! Join us for a fireside chat with the founder of Reddit and General Partner at Initialized Capital. We'll have a bit of time to take a few audience questions so if you'd like to ask Alexis a question, please fill out this form - http://bit.ly/Questions-for-Alexis.

Agenda
5:45 PM: Check In and Registration
6:30 PM: Fireside Chat wtih Alexis Ohanian (moderated by Aziza Sheerin, Regional Director, Singapore, General Assembly)

This event is co-presented with NTUC U Startup and Tech in Asia. 

Note: Alexis will also be speaking at the Tech in Asia conference on 17th May 2017. https://www.techinasia.com/events/singapore. Attendees of the fireside chat get a special promo price for the conference. Please use the code GA at checkout to get a discount.
events.location: NTUC Auditorium (1 Marina Boulevard, Level 7), , Singapore

events.name: Data Science @ Uber
events.description:
This month, we are excited to have data scientists from Uber (USA) to share with us about how data science powers their vision to make transportation as reliable as running water, everywhere, for everyone.  RSVP - Opens: 10pm, 9th May 2017 - Closes: 10pm, 15th May 2017  Please note our new attendance policy. Attendees are REQUIRED to RSVP to the event to be allowed into the venue. People who are neither in the "going" or "wait" lists will be turned away. Please fill in your full name and email in the sign-in form after you RSVP (for security clearance).  Event details  • 6:15pm - 6:45pm: Networking [casual; small talk]  • 6:45pm - 7pm: Policy Data Science at Uber -- Amy Smith [core] • 7pm - 7:15pm: Product Data Science at Uber -- JR New [core] • 7:15pm - 7:25pm: The Uber Data Science Team -- Silvanus Lee [core] • 7:25pm - 8:00pm: Data Science Panel Q&A -- Silvanus Lee, JR New,  Amy Smith, Grace Tang [core] • 8:00pm - 8:30pm: Networking [casual; small talk]  

[] : Suggested rating and topic; ranges from: newbie - casual - core - hardcore.
events.location: Uber Singapore, Guoco Tower, 1 Wallich Street, Level 35

events.name: PyData Meetup - May 2017
events.description: Agenda  • 6:45pm - 7:00pm Networking • 7:00pm - 8:00pm Presentation: Preventing disasters in construction - the Ackcio way Synopsis:  Mistakes during construction kill people and, often the involved construction company. To prevent this, the industry spends billions of dollars every year to monitor the construction sites by reading thousands of scattered sensors using kilometers of cables, or a specialized workforce. These solutions are expensive, error prone, and hard to manage. At Ackcio, we build extremely reliable wireless monitoring solutions that can totally eliminate cables and reduce the dependence of manpower. Using this technology, we are automating the process of gathering construction data that can be analysed to spot disasters way before they occur, and even help constructors build buildings smarter.   Bio: Nimantha is the Co-Founder and CEO of Ackcio. He obtained his PhD from NUS, specialising in wireless networks. His patent-pending techniques on improving VoIP quality on Wi-Fi networks have been integrated in Skype. Updates •  Join us on Facebook and Twitter  https://www.facebook.com/groups/pydatasg/https://www.twitter.com/pydatasg Sponsors   Group Sponsor
